EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Telco Luncheon Series_Q314.08 Thank You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the Executive Luncheon on Telecommunications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ-Telco-luncheonseries.html> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Sorry you couldn't attend our Executive Luncheon on Telecommunications. We hope to see you next time.
Here is a link to some recent blog articles that Paul Davey has written that you might find of interest: http://blog.pivotal.io/author/pdavey
The Pivotal Team
